*************************
Description of Misc files
*************************

*** default.svg ***

SVG source of the image used as the default obsel 
visualisation icon in widget d3Basic.TraceDisplayIcons.

*** default.png ***

PNG image used as the default obsel visualisation icon in 
widget d3Basic.TraceDisplayIcons.
This image is encoded into a DATA-URI with base64 command.

*** javascript.php ***

PHP script that facilitates the inclusion of JavaScript 
files. This PHP script concatenates all the JS files 
contained in the same folder as the current folder.
This script does not include JS files in subfolders.

*** javascript_all.php ***

PHP script that facilitates the inclusion of JavaScript 
files. This PHP script concatenates all the JS files 
contained in the same folder and subfolders as the current 
folder.
